dcterms:description: A curated subset of the LAION/CC/SBU dataset, specifically filtered to achieve a more balanced distribution of concept coverage, including captions paired with BLIP synthetic captions.

dcterms:creator: H. Liu

dcterms:description: A mixture of ten distinct datasets, including LLaVA, ShareGPT, VQAv2, GQA, OKVQA, OCRVQA, A-OKVQA, TextCaps, RefCOCO, and Visual Genome, used for instruction tuning.
dcterms:title: LLaVA-v1.5 655K

dcterms:description: A dataset containing visual instructions generated by GPT-4, encompassing 16 different vision-and-language tasks with open-ended instructions and answers, aimed at mitigating hallucination.
